SELECT T2.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, T1.* FROM( SELECT mt.STR_ID, bt.ID, bt.MEMBER_ID, bt.CONTENT, bt.TITLE, bt.BOARD_TYPE, bt.HIT, bt.STATUS, TO_CHAR(bt.REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGDATE FROM BOARD_TB bt LEFT JOIN MEMBER_TB mt ON bt.MEMBER_ID = mt.ID WHERE bt.BOARD_TYPE = 'freeFaq' and bt.status = 'none' ORDER BY bt.ID DESC ) T1 ) T2
T2.RNUM between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
